newsitem.title: USA: Baltimore Gas 850 MW power unit trips off.
newsitem.headline: Baltimore Gas 850 MW power unit trips off.

text.p: Baltimore Gas' 850 megawatt (MW) Calvert Cliffs 2 nuclear power plant tripped off line over the weekend, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) reported Monday.
The NRC said the unit was being kept on "hot standby", which typically indicates it is not expected to be off line for long. No reason was given for the unit tripping off line.
An estimated restart time for the unit, in Lusby, Md., was given in the NRC daily status report as November 19. The report is based on filings with the NRC by the plant's operator.
